articles.author: TRAVIS LOLLER, LEAH WILLINGHAM, JENNIFER SINCO KELLEHER
articles.title: Farmers, business owners, fire survivors face uncertainty after $100B in disaster relief flounders - The Associated Press
articles.description: American farmers, small business owners and wildfire survivors are among those who will suffer if Congress cannot agree on a new spending bill after President-elect Donald Trump abruptly rejected a bipartisan plan that included more than $100 billion in disas…
articles.content: NASHVILLE, Tenn. (AP) American farmers, small business owners and wildfire survivors are among those who will suffer if Congress cannot agree on a new spending bill after President-elect Donald Trump… [+6071 chars]
